ARABIC: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَأَلْقِيَاهُ فِى ٱلْعَذَابِ ٱلشَّدِيدِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: who set up another god together with Allah. Hurl him into the terrible punishment.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Who had set up another god with God. Cast him into severe torment."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and has set up another deity with Allah. Hurl him into the grievous torment.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and an idol worshipper. Throw him into severe torment".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “The one who appointed another God along with Allah – so both of you fling him into the severe punishment.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Who set up another god with Allah. Then both of you cast him in the severe torment."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Who sets up another god with Allah, so do cast him into severe chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: who set up with God another god; therefore, you twain, cast him into the terrible chastisement.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Who setteth up another god along with Allah. Do ye twain hurl him to the dreadful doom.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: who has set up another god besides God: cast him into severe punishment" --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Who set up with Allah another god. So cast him ye twain into the torment severe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: who had set up another god along with Allah and cast him into the severe punishment.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Who set up another god beside Allah: Throw him into a severe penalty."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Who set up another ilah (god) with Allah, then (both of you) cast him in the severe torment."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: who has set up with Allah another god. Indeed, you two, cast him into the terrible punishment'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Who fabricated another god with God; toss him into the intense agony.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Who made [as equal] with Allah another deity; then throw him into the severe punishment."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [50:26] who has set up alongside God another god! (alladhī ja‘ala ma‘a’Llāhi ilāhan ākhara is the subject, with an implicitly conditional import, the predicate of which is [the following]). Cast him then into the severe chastisement’ (the explanation of this [dual form of the verb alqiyāhu, ‘cast him’] is as above).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Who setteth up another god along with Allah) who claims that Allah has a son and a partner. (Do ye twain hurl him to the dreadful doom) Allah would say to the angels who recorded his deeds: cast him in the severe torment.
